mapper.update: UPDATE concpm SET cp_nm = #{cpNm}, cp_start_dt = #{cpStartDt}, cp_end_dt = #{cpEndDt}, cp_place_nm = #{cpPlaceNm}, cp_scale_cd = #{cpScaleCd}, cp_type_cd = #{cpTypeCd}, expect_user_num = #{expectUserNum}, udt_id = #{udtId}, udt_ip = #{udtIp}, udt_date = current_timestamp WHERE tenant_id = #{tenantId} AND cp_cd = #{cpCd}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(1) OVER() AS totalCount, cust.mgr_nm as mgrNm, cust.mgr_tel_no as mgrTelNo, cont.cont_nm as contNm, cp.tenant_id as tenantId, cp.cp_cd as cpCd, cp.cp_nm as cpNm, cp.cp_start_dt as cpStartDt, cp.cp_end_dt as cpEndDt, cp.cp_place_nm as cpPlaceNm, cp.cp_scale_cd as cpScaleCd, cp.cp_type_cd as cpTypeCd, cp.expect_user_num as expectUserNum, cp.crt_id as crtId, cp.crt_ip as crtIp, cp.ad_date as adDate, cp.udt_id as udtId, cp.udt_ip as udtIp, cp.udt_date as udtDate FROM concustm cust, concustcontm cont, concpm cp WHERE cust.cust_id = cont.cust_id AND cont.tenant_id = cp.tenant_id order by cp.tenant_id desc LIMIT #{rowPerPage} OFFSET #{skipCount}
